mapper.sql: id, relation_id, goods_id, standard_id, sell_specifications_id, goods_name, standard_goods_name, standard_license_no, sell_specifications, license_no, is_patent, requirements, rebate, del_flag, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, remark
mapper.select: SELECT pprg.goods_id FROM pop_procurement_relation_goods pprg LEFT JOIN pop_procurement_relation ppr ON pprg.relation_id = ppr.id LEFT JOIN pop_goods pg on pprg.sell_specifications_id = pg.sell_specifications_id and pg.eid = ppr.delivery_eid and pg.`status` = 1 and pg.del_flag = 0 WHERE pprg.del_flag = 0 AND ppr.del_flag = 0 AND ppr.start_time <= NOW() AND ppr.end_time >= NOW() AND ppr.proc_relation_status = 2 AND ppr.channel_partner_eid = #{request.buyerEid} GROUP BY pprg.goods_id ORDER BY sum(pg.goods_status=1) desc
